thread.title: Tax cut deal raises hopes for German coalition

title: Tax cut deal raises hopes for German coalition
text:
Tax cut deal raises hopes for German coalition 5:18pm GMT - 01:41 
German Chancellor Angela Merkel's conservatives and the centre-left Social Democrats (SPD) have reportedly agreed to provide income tax relief for high earners, signalling progress in their talks on forming a coalition government. Ivor Bennett reports   
German Chancellor Angela Merkel's conservatives and the centre-left Social Democrats (SPD) have reportedly agreed to provide income tax relief for high earners, signalling progress in their talks on forming a coalition government. Ivor Bennett reports  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/01/08/tax-cut-deal-raises-hopes-for-german-coa?videoId=381239087&videoChannel=78
